description:
11.86 exposure
Adjust exposure of the video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: exposure

options.description: Set the exposure correction in EV. Allowed range is from -3.0 to 3.0 EV Default value is 0 EV.
options.name: exposure

options.description: Set the black level correction. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.
options.name: black
